translation.en: Lord, have mercy on us.
Christ, have mercy on us.
Lord, have mercy on us. Christ, hear us.
translation.es: Señor, ten piedad de nosotros. Cristo, escúchanos.

translation.en: Christ, graciously hear us.
God, the Father in heaven.
translation.es: Dios, el Padre en el cielo.

translation.en: Have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Ghost.
Have mercy on us.
The Holy Trinity, one God.
translation.es: La Santísima Trinidad, un solo Dios.

translation.en: Have mercy on us.
Good night, Joe. Good night, Father.
Dennis, your minute steak's getting cold.
Confession went late.
Agnes Samson thought about stealing her sister's watch.
translation.es: Agnes Samson pensó en robar el reloj de su hermana.

translation.en: Took a good ten minutes to convince her that wasn't a sin.
translation.es: Tardé diez minutos en convencerla de que no era pecado.

translation.en: Well, Dennis, this is Father Adeyemi.
translation.es: Dennis, él es el padre Adeyemi.

translation.en: Visiting the archdiocese from Nigeria.
translation.es: Vino de Nigeria a visitar la arquidiócesis.

translation.en: My pleasure. Welcome to California. Ah, thank you.
translation.es: - Un placer. Bienvenido a California. - Gracias.

translation.en: Eat up, McMurtry.
Miracle on 34th Street is playing at the Westmont.
translation.es: Dan Milagro en la calle 34 en el Westmont.

translation.en: Will you be joining us, Father McMurtry?
I'll stay in tonight, thanks.
It's been raining pretty hard, and I think I'm coming down with something.
translation.es: Llovió mucho. Creo que estoy por enfermarme.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
Hello, ladies.
Hi.
Can I help you?
Sorry to bother you. My car broke down up the road, and it's getting cold out.
translation.es: Perdón por molestarlo. Mi auto se averió y hace frío.

translation.en: I hate to ask, but I wonder if I could use your phone?
translation.es: Me preguntaba si podría usar su teléfono.

translation.en: Oh, sure. Please, come in, dry off.
Thank you very much.
The… the telephone is in the parlor if you'd like to call the garage.
translation.es: El teléfono está en la sala si quiere llamar al taller mecánico.

translation.en: Can I make you a cup of coffee?
That'd be nice. Thanks.
Where are you coming from?
All over, I guess.
You're welcome to that, if you're hungry.
I'll eat it later.
Fantastic. Just fantastic, Monsignor.
That was magical. I'm glad you enjoyed it.
translation.es: - Fue mágico. - Qué bueno que le gustó.

translation.en: Oh, boy.
I'll put on some coffee, warm us up.
Thank you.
That's probably a new experience.
Yes. She is magnificent.
- Sleep well. - Thank you, Monsignor.
- Glad you enjoyed it. - Good night.
translation.es: - Qué bueno que le gustó. - Adiós.

translation.en: - Good night. - Thanks again, Monsignor.
What's going on?
No! No!
- No! -
Hello, Monsignor.
Sister Margaret McGuire,
you remember her?
She was my mother.
You're my dad, Monsignor.
That's…
that's nonsense.
All right, all right, I knew her.
W… we did things together, but she wanted it.
translation.es: Hicimos cosas juntos, pero ella lo deseaba.

translation.en: She ended up in a whore house.
One of them shot her up with morphine…
translation.es: Uno de ellos le inyectó morfina y la mató.

translation.en: - Please forgive me! - …and it killed her.
translation.es: Uno de ellos le inyectó morfina y la mató. ¡Perdóname!

translation.en: And I got sent to an orphanage.
translation.es: Y me enviaron a un orfanato.

translation.en: Look, you've got to understand.
I'm a sinner.
I've suffered for my sins.
No, no, no, no, no.
Now you're gonna suffer.
Here's that map you asked for, ma'am. Thank you.
translation.es: - Aquí está el mapa que pidió, señora. - Gracias.

translation.en: May I ask why you're headed to Lucia?
It seems like a rather personal question, now, doesn't it?
Sorry.
Clearly your tumescence has distracted you, sir.
I recall asking for today's local paper.
translation.es: Pedí el periódico local de hoy.

translation.en: Oh! Sorry.
Here you go.
Yeah, it's big news around here.
Everybody's up in arms.
Fella cuts up a bunch of priests and they ship him up to Lucia?
translation.es: ¿Un tipo despedaza a unos sacerdotes y lo envían a Lucía?

translation.en: Hey, that's where you're headed.
You're not some sort of journalist or something, are you?
translation.es: No es reportera o algo así, ¿verdad?

translation.en: You should bathe more often.
Your fingernails are filthy.
What do I owe the pleasure?
I have a reservation.
What's the name?
Vultures, all of them.
San Francisco Chronicle is offering $5,000
translation.es: El San Francisco Chronicle ofrece 5000 dólares

translation.en: to whoever gets the first shot of the Clergy Killer.
translation.es: a quien tome la primera foto del Matacuras.

translation.en: You're not a vulture, are you?
No, ma'am.
I'm a nurse.
Ice machine's at the end in the interior of the breezeway.
translation.es: La máquina de hielo está al final del pasillo cubierto.

translation.en: We provide that machine as a courtesy,
so I wouldn't abuse that privilege if I were you.
translation.es: así que no abusaría de ese privilegio si fuera usted.

translation.en: I pay very close attention
to how much ice is in that machine at any given time.
translation.es: cuánto hielo hay en esa máquina en todo momento.

translation.en: God damn it.
May I offer help with the key?
Not much to look at, but we've got a phone in the office.
translation.es: No es gran cosa, pero tenemos un teléfono en la oficina.

translation.en: Thank you.
And just so you know, if you happen to have any gentlemen callers,
translation.es: Y, para que sepa, si recibe visitas de caballeros,

translation.en: I'm going to know about it.
And I do not run a house of ill repute.
Do you understand me?
Hello, I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
translation.es: Hola, vine a ver al Dr. Hanover.

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you, sir.
Sir, it is a pleasure to meet you.
I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
translation.es: Vengo desde muy lejos y solo deseo hablar con él.

translation.en: Priest killer must die!
I have an appointment. Thank you.
Can I help you?
Hello. I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
translation.es: Hola. Vine a ver al Dr. Hanover.

translation.en: I'm sorry, darlin'. He's not talking to press right now.
translation.es: Lo siento, cariño. No habla con la prensa.

translation.en: Oh, I'm not the press. I'm the new night shift nurse.
translation.es: No soy de la prensa. Soy la nueva enfermera del turno noche.

translation.en: Dr. Hanover hasn't technically hired me yet,
translation.es: El Dr. Hanover técnicamente no me contrató aún,

translation.en: but I'm supposed to have a formal interview with him at 11:00,
translation.es: pero tengo una entrevista formal con él a las 11:00,

translation.en: as this letter clearly states.
Okay, one second. I'm just gonna go get a nurse.
Oh, I'm sorry.
You aren't a nurse?
Me? No.
I'm a nurse trainee.
I admire nurses more than anything.
translation.es: Admiro a las enfermeras más que a nadie.

translation.en: They really are God's angels.
Yes. Yes, we are.
Okay, be right back.
Hiya.
Have a nice day.
My preliminary recommendation is this:
that if Mr. Salvatore wants the board to seriously consider a furlough,
translation.es: Si el Sr. Salvatore quiere que la junta considere darle un permiso,

translation.en: he must continue with Dr. Hanover's regimen of colonics,
translation.es: debe continuar con la hidroterapia de colon del Dr. Hanover,

translation.en: he must attend group therapy three times daily,
translation.es: asistir a terapia grupal tres veces al día

translation.en: and he must take his saltpeter tablets as prescribed.
translation.es: y tomar sus pastillas de salitre según lo prescrito.

translation.en: Am I understood?
Nurse Bucket?
You're needed at nurse's station one.
Excuse me.
There's a letter.
Where did you get this?
You must be the head nurse.
translation.es: Debe ser la jefa de enfermeras.

translation.en: I didn't ask what your name was.
Where did you get the letter?
Why, it was sent to me.
That's where I'm confused,
because there is no one in his office except for Dr. Hanover and myself.
translation.es: porque en la oficina del Dr. Hanover solo estamos él y yo.

translation.en: I didn't send that.  And I can assure you, that isn't Dr. Hanover's signature.
translation.es: No envié eso y le aseguro que esa no es la firma del Dr. Hanover.

translation.en: I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
translation.es: Vengo desde muy lejos y solo deseo hablar con él.

translation.en: Dr. Hanover is out of the office till later this afternoon.
translation.es: El Dr. Hanover no regresará hasta la tarde.

translation.en: If you'd like to leave a number--
If you don't mind, I'd prefer to wait here.
translation.es: Si no le molesta, lo esperaré aquí.

translation.en: He'll be gone some time.
You just said he'd return in the afternoon.
translation.es: Dijo que regresaría por la tarde.

translation.en: It could be longer.
Well, then it could be shorter.
By your own logic.
I truly don't mind waiting.
I have nowhere else to be.
Very well.
- - I'm sorry, Dr. Hanover.
The governor's going to have to reschedule. Maybe next month.
translation.es: El gobernador no podrá verlo hoy. Quizá el mes que viene.

translation.en: Another?
No, thank you. Got a long journey back.
translation.es: No, gracias. Tengo un largo viaje de regreso.

translation.en: …on second thought…
Good afternoon.
Good afternoon, Governor.
I have your booth in the back for you. Right this way.
translation.es: Su mesa está reservada. Por aquí.

translation.en: Excuse me, Gov. Wilburn. Dr. Richard Hanover.
translation.es: Disculpe, gobernador. Soy el Dr. Richard Hanover.

translation.en: - I know who you are. - We had a meeting scheduled today.
translation.es: - Sé quién es. - Teníamos una reunión hoy.

translation.en: You're the guy who runs the loony bin in Lucia.
translation.es: Es el que dirige el manicomio de Lucía.

translation.en: I prefer the term psychiatric rehabilitation facility.
translation.es: Yo lo llamo centro de rehabilitación psiquiátrica.

translation.en: We had a similar meeting scheduled last month, and the month before that.
translation.es: Programamos reuniones similares el mes pasado y el mes anterior.

translation.en: Maybe we should hear him out.
Tell you what, I'll give you until the moment our drinks are delivered for you to give me your pitch.
translation.es: Le doy hasta que nos traigan las bebidas para que me convenza.

translation.en: Excuse me, do you mind?
I didn't invite you to sit.
You see, Governor, I don't run a loony bin.
My hospital is a bastion of recovery and rehabilitation unlike any other.
translation.es: Mi hospital es un bastión sin igual de recuperación y rehabilitación.

translation.en: Now, as for the funding, I'm currently constructing a barn
translation.es: En cuanto a los fondos, estoy construyendo un granero

translation.en: to be used in various therapeutic regimens.
translation.es: que se usará para varios tratamientos.

translation.en: - And people are-- - And… time's up.
We can maybe meet again in a month or so, or…
translation.es: Podemos reunirnos en un mes o algo así.

translation.en: Thank you for your time, Governor.
Yeah.
Interesting.
Looking good today, Miss Dolly.
Thanks, Harold.
Whatcha up to?
Just making my rounds.
Excuse me.
Where can I find your restroom?
Down the hall to the left.
translation.es: Por el pasillo a la izquierda.

translation.en: Thank you.
You're welcome.
Looking good today, Mildred.
Is there something specific you needed, Nurse Bucket?
I'm afraid there's a woman here.
She says she has a job interview with you.
translation.es: Dice que tiene una entrevista de trabajo.

translation.en: I didn't agree to any such thing.
Get rid of her, please.
I tried, she's very insistent.
I'll take care of it.
You. Are you the one who's here for the interview?
translation.es: Usted. ¿Es la que vino a la entrevista?

translation.en: Yes, an interview that was supposed to start several hours ago.
translation.es: Sí, una entrevista que debía comenzar hace varias horas.

translation.en: Forgive me, Dr. Hanover, I know your work is very important.
translation.es: Disculpe, Dr. Hanover. Sé que su trabajo es importante.

translation.en: But I, too, value my time.
translation.es: Pero yo también valoro mi tiempo.

translation.en: But I suppose if you were willing to conduct the interview right now,
translation.es: Si accediera a hacer la entrevista ahora,

translation.en: I could try my best to look past the insult.
Your office is this way?
Uh, yeah. Right this way.
I apologize for the mix- up.
If I'm being honest, I don't recall consenting to any sort of an interview.
translation.es: Pare ser sincero, no recuerdo haber accedido a ninguna entrevista.

translation.en: That's quite all right, Doctor.
With a nursing staff as unexceptional as the one you have,
translation.es: Con enfermeras tan mediocres como las suyas,

translation.en: certain clerical errors are bound to happen.
translation.es: es lógico que haya errores administrativos.

translation.en: Nurse Bucket, a moment, please.
Please, take a seat.
I hope it's not inappropriate, Doctor, to confess something,
translation.es: Espero que no sea inapropiado confesar algo,

translation.en: but I was a nurse in the Pacific theater during the war.
translation.es: pero fui enfermera en el Frente del Pacífico.

translation.en: Where exactly were you stationed?
I island- hopped with Admiral Nimitz's boys,
translation.es: Iba de isla en isla con los chicos del almirante Nimitz.

translation.en: from Tarawa, to Saipan, to Okinawa.
translation.es: De Tarawa a Saipan, a Okinawa.

translation.en: You'll see that's where I became familiar with administering anesthetics.
translation.es: Allí me familiaricé con administrar anestesias.

translation.en: I'm well versed in all the blood derivatives,
oxygen therapy, and, of course, the treatment of shock.
translation.es: la oxigenoterapia y la terapia de shock.

translation.en: Do you have scat throwers here?
Patients who throw their feces?
Oh, yes. In fact, we do.
translation.es: Sí, a decir verdad, los tenemos.

translation.en: Well, that won't faze me.
I've encountered many cases of soldiers with battle fatigue,
translation.es: He visto muchos casos de soldados con fatiga de combate.

translation.en: who lost their wits entirely.
Men who would try to rape a woman if they could get a hold of her,
translation.es: Eran hombres que intentaban violar a una mujer,

translation.en: and when they couldn't, would content themselves by throwing excrement…
translation.es: pero que se contentaban con lanzar excremento si no lo lograban.

translation.en: ejaculate...
But I was not deterred, Doctor. In fact, I was invigorated…
translation.es: Eso no me disuadió, doctor, sino que me fortaleció,

translation.en: because I was a member of the most unsung profession we have in this country.
translation.es: porque era miembro de la profesión menos reconocida del país.

translation.en: We had a saying in the Corps, Save one life, and you're a hero.
translation.es: En el cuerpo de enfermeras decíamos: Salva una vida y eres un héroe.

translation.en: Save 100 lives…
…well, then you're a nurse.
I must say you're a very impressive woman, Miss Ratched.
translation.es: Es una mujer sorprendente, Srta. Ratched.

translation.en: And clearly passionate.
- But unfortunately-- - May I venture one last query, Doctor?
Do you believe the human mind can be cured?
translation.es: ¿Cree que la mente humana puede curarse?

translation.en: I do.
But it's not about belief.
translation.es: Pero no se trata de creer.

translation.en: It requires no act of faith. I've seen it with my own eyes.
translation.es: No es necesario un acto de fe. Lo vi con mis propios ojos.

translation.en: I have not.
But I hope you'll believe me when I tell you
it is all I want in the world.
translation.es: si le digo que es lo único que quiero en el mundo.

translation.en: Miss Ratched, you're…
one of the more interesting women I've had the pleasure of meeting,
translation.es: es una de las mujeres más interesantes que conocí.

translation.en: but I'm sad to say that until I can secure more funding from the state,
translation.es: Pero hasta que el estado no me otorgue más fondos,

translation.en: I simply don't have the resources to bring you on.
translation.es: no tengo los recursos para contratarla.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
But when there is an opening, please trust that I will consider you.
translation.es: Pero, cuando haya una oportunidad, la tendré en cuenta.

translation.en: Well…
if there's one thing I've learned, Doctor…
it's that life can be quite unpredictable.
translation.es: es que la vida es impredecible.

translation.en: Thank you for your time.
The sheets were not ironed correctly, the bedpans were a disgrace,
translation.es: Las sábanas estaban mal planchadas, las bacinillas estaban sucias

translation.en: and Amelia, too much smiling.
I mean, could we have less teeth and more work?
translation.es: Muestra menos los dientes y trabaja más, ¿sí?

translation.en: Thank you all for your help.
And the towels, were they folded by the blind?
Come on.
Hello.
I'm looking for Amelia Emerson.
She's not home, and I'm about to head out on a sales call. Something I can help you with?
translation.es: No está en casa y yo estoy saliendo. ¿Puedo ayudarla?

translation.en: Oh, I'm just an old high school friend passing through town.
translation.es: Soy una vieja amiga de la secundaria. Estoy de paso.

translation.en: Maybe you could give her a message?
What was your name?
Arlene. Arlene Bauer.
The question is, is this an attempt at avoiding the death penalty, or is Edmund Tolleson really crazy?
translation.es: ¿Está intentando evitar la pena de muerte o realmente está loco?

translation.en: He's being transported from San Quentin Prison
translation.es: Lo transportan de la prisión de San Quintín

translation.en: for psychiatric evaluation.
Law enforcement is keeping some of the details under wraps,
translation.es: La policía mantiene en secreto los detalles,

translation.en: but word is that one of the victims was almost beheaded.
translation.es: pero se dice que una de las víctimas casi fue decapitada.

translation.en: That concludes our special report on the Clergy Killer.
translation.es: Ese fue el informe sobre el Matacuras.

translation.en: - And now… - Do you think you could do me a favor?
This killer gives me the chills, and I'm not talking Bela Lugosi chills.
translation.es: Este asesino me da escalofríos, y no como los que me da Bela Lugosi.

translation.en: Although, I'd sell my soul for a date with him.
translation.es: Aunque vendería mi alma por una cita con él.

translation.en: I'd let him sink his teeth into me and suck me dry
translation.es: Dejaría que me clavara los dientes y me chupara la sangre

translation.en: as if he really were Count Dracula.
translation.es: como si fuera el conde Drácula.

translation.en: If you could just do--
translation.es: - Si pudiera... - Leí todos los periódicos.

translation.en: I read all these papers, and none of them describe
translation.es: - Si pudiera... - Leí todos los periódicos. Ninguno realmente describe

translation.en: what this Edmund fella actually did to those priests.
translation.es: lo que el tal Edmund realmente les hizo a esos curas.

translation.en: Now, what favor can I do for you?
If anyone calls asking for Arlene Bauer, could you let me know?
translation.es: ¿Me avisaría si alguien llama y pregunta por Arlene Bower?

translation.en: It's a little joke between me and an old friend.
translation.es: Es una broma entre una vieja amiga y yo.

translation.en: And is Arlene Bauer paying for another night's room,
translation.es: ¿Y Arlene Bower pagará por una noche más en la habitación

translation.en: or are you two splitting the bill?
A smile like that could melt ice.
translation.es: Una sonrisa así podría derretir el hielo.

translation.en: So I've been told.
Well, I don't like it.
A lady in my position could go so far as to say you're leering.
translation.es: Una mujer en mi posición podría decir que mira lascivamente.

translation.en: A gentleman in my position can't help it
translation.es: Un caballero en mi posición no puede evitarlo

translation.en: when he's staring at a beautiful woman like yourself.
translation.es: al ver a una mujer tan bella como usted.

translation.en: No, I'm not married.
I've never done this before.
Do you think we could just sit?
Actually, can you sit on that corner?
So what do we do now?
Let's pretend we're husband and wife who've just had a fight.
translation.es: Finjamos que somos marido y mujer, y acabamos de discutir.

translation.en: What was the fight about?
Children.
You want them, but I don't.
translation.es: Tú quieres tenerlos, pero yo no.

translation.en: I believe they're nothing but a burden,
translation.es: Yo creo que solo son una carga.

translation.en: but you believe a family isn't a family without them.
translation.es: Tú crees que una familia no está completa sin ellos.

translation.en: What are you doing?
So when do we make up?
We don't.
You leave.
Why would I leave?
Because…
you'll think you're right,
and I'll think I'm right.
translation.es: y yo pensaré que tengo razón.

translation.en: Then we'll both realize it's not going to work.
translation.es: Y nos daremos cuenta de que no funcionará.

translation.en: And then we'll get a divorce.
Only to find soon after that I'm pregnant.
translation.es: Poco después descubriremos que estoy embarazada.

translation.en: And you will convince me to keep it.
translation.es: Y tú me convencerás de que lo tenga.

translation.en: And then you'll die.
I'll raise it for a few years till I can't do it anymore,
translation.es: La criaré unos años hasta que no pueda más

translation.en: and then I will leave her on a doorstep.
translation.es: y luego la dejaré en un umbral.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't see what the problem is.
translation.es: Lo siento. No veo cuál es el problema.

translation.en: When you're ready, you know where to find me.
translation.es: Cuando estés lista, sabes dónde estaré.

translation.en: Is that all you got?
Arlene Bauer,
you have a phone call.
You should take your coat off.
It's warm in here.
Do you need a drink?
Walter is an excellent bartender.
Look, I don't know what you think you saw.
translation.es: Mira, no sé qué crees que viste.

translation.en: Oh, I know what I saw.
What is it you want?
Your job.
And since there aren't any positions available,
translation.es: Y, como no hay puestos disponibles,

translation.en: I have been forced to create one myself.
translation.es: me he visto en la obligación de crear uno.

translation.en: What makes you think my husband will believe you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué piensas que mi esposo te creerá?

translation.en: And what am I supposed to tell him?
Tell him this town is poison…
translation.es: Que este pueblo es la perdición...

translation.en: and that you want to get as far away from it as possible.
translation.es: y que quieres alejarte de aquí lo más posible.

translation.en: For your daughter.
How would you feel about your hospital
being the cornerstone of the governor's reelection campaign?
translation.es: fuera el pilar de la campaña de reelección del gobernador?

translation.en: What is there to say? I'm…
I'm speechless.
Your facility,
your bold new ideas,
their proven results,
this will force voters to see the governor in a whole new light.
translation.es: Esto obligará a los votantes a ver al gobernador con otros ojos.

translation.en: Not as a musty old bureaucrat, but as a forward- thinking progressive.
translation.es: No como un burócrata viejo, sino como un progresista innovador.

translation.en: A leader who can rehabilitate a lost segment of the state workforce
translation.es: Un líder que puede rehabilitar un sector perdido de la fuerza laboral

translation.en: and move them back into the economy.
I believe this will swing momentum back to us…
translation.es: Creo que esto nos devolverá el impulso...

translation.en: and the governor into his reelection.
translation.es: y le dará la reelección al gobernador.

translation.en: So, Doctor.
What do you say?
I can't believe it, sir.
Our hospital. I mean, your hospital…
…finally getting the recognition it deserves.
translation.es: Por fin recibirá el reconocimiento que merece.

translation.en: This is everything we've ever wanted.
We have work to do.
Nowhere do I want anything greater than a ten- to- one patient- to- staff ratio.
translation.es: Debemos mantener una proporción de diez pacientes por empleado.

translation.en: - Is that clear? - That could be difficult, sir.
Why is that difficult, Nurse Bucket?
Well, sir, it's Amelia. She hasn't shown up yet.
translation.es: Bueno, señor. Es Amelia. Aún no ha venido.

translation.en: What about Jackie? She's on vacation in Monterey.
And who approved that? You, I imagine.
translation.es: ¿Y quién lo aprobó? Supongo que usted.

translation.en: Mm, Dr. Hanover, service came for you.
translation.es: Dr. Hanover. Llegó esto para usted.

translation.en: Phone call. A Dr. Richard Hanover.
This is a big day for all of us.
translation.es: Este es un gran día para todos.

translation.en: Doctors, nurses, and low- level attendants.
translation.es: Doctores, enfermeras y asistentes de rango bajo.

translation.en: It is imperative that we live up to the expectations
translation.es: Es imperativo que cumplamos con las expectativas

translation.en: that attracted Gov. Wilburn's attention.
translation.es: que llamaron la atención del gobernador Wilburn.

translation.en: It is our moment to prove why this hospital is so special.
translation.es: Es hora de demostrar por qué este hospital es tan especial.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
Me?
I'm… I'm just here to help.
Every square inch of this facility needs to be spotless.
translation.es: Cada centímetro de este hospital debe estar impecable.

translation.en: Every surface, I should be able to eat runny eggs off of it.
translation.es: Debo poder comer mi desayuno sobre cada superficie.

translation.en: No!
Unruly patients need to be humanely tamed…
translation.es: Los pacientes rebeldes deben ser controlados y calmados...

translation.en: and tranquil.
And you must all perform your duties
translation.es: Y todos deben desempeñar sus tareas

translation.en: in the utmost professional manner possible.
Do I make myself clear?
- - Absolutely. Thank you so much.
Good. Now let's get to it.
- - Governor!
Mio fratello…  Mio fratello…
voglio stare con te.
The new barn will become the heartbeat of Lucia,
translation.es: El nuevo granero se convertirá en el corazón de Lucía.

translation.en: using all the latest advances in assisted therapy to calm even the most troubled mind
translation.es: Usaremos lo último en terapia asistida para calmar las mentes más perturbadas

translation.en: before we even begin administering a single medication.
translation.es: antes de administrar siquiera un solo medicamento.

translation.en: That's marvelous. That's wonderful! Do you hear that, guys?
Yes, sir.
- Please, no. -
translation.es: Por favor, no. No quiero que me fotografíen.

translation.en: - I do not wish to be photographed. - What about Edmund Tolleson?
translation.es: Por favor, no. No quiero que me fotografíen. ¿Y Edmund Tolleson?

translation.en: What precautions have you taken to ensure your patients' and staff's safety when he arrives?
translation.es: ¿Cómo garantizará la seguridad de sus pacientes y del personal?

translation.en: - Where are you gonna chain him up? - All right, come on.
Well, we don't chain anyone up.
He's a human being.
But as for the logistical problems of housing Mr. Tolleson,
translation.es: En cuanto a la logística de albergar al Sr. Tolleson,

translation.en: we found a solution that's both canny and budget- conscious.
translation.es: encontramos una solución que es inteligente y económica.

translation.en: As you may know, this facility was formerly a rest spa.
translation.es: Como sabrán, este lugar era un spa de descanso.

translation.en: It actually has a wine cellar deep underground.
We've transformed that space into a maximum- security holding area
translation.es: Hemos transformado ese espacio en un área de máxima seguridad

translation.en: where Edmund will be housed until he is evaluated.
translation.es: donde Edmund estará alojado hasta que lo evalúen.

translation.en: A wine cellar. Are you kidding me?
Come on now.
Edmund Tolleson is not the story I brought you here to cover.
translation.es: No vinieron a cubrir la historia de Edmund Tolleson.

translation.en: It certainly isn't the one you're going to run!
Dr. Hanover!
It's Father Murphy.
Get me a blanket. We need to make sure he stays warm.
translation.es: Tráeme una manta. Debe mantenerse caliente.

translation.en: - What's going on? - He collapsed.
What are you doing?
Don't touch him!
Don't you ever lay a hand on me!
How dare you!
Just wait for it!
There, there. Keep breathing, keep breathing.
translation.es: Eso es. No deje de respirar.

translation.en: Stay with us, Father.
His blood pressure was dangerously low.
translation.es: Tenía la presión arterial muy baja.

translation.en: The shock nearly killed him.
Did you say shock?
I think someone gave him the wrong medication.
translation.es: Alguien le dio la medicación equivocada.

translation.en: Hey there, Mister. Gov. Wilburn, how about a picture with me?
translation.es: Señor, soy el gobernador. ¿Nos tomamos una foto?

translation.en: - Come on. Let's go. - Look this way, please.
Look into the camera, there you go. Big smile!
What's wrong with him?
They just told him that his brother passed away, poor thing.
translation.es: Le acaban de decir que su hermano falleció. Pobrecito.

translation.en: Not that it would have mattered.
He didn't know, but he wasn't getting furloughed anyway.
translation.es: No lo sabía, pero no iban a darle permiso.

translation.en: His nephew called, said they didn't want him let out.
translation.es: Su sobrino llamó y pidió que no lo dejaran salir.

translation.en: Look here.
Look up and smile.
Miss Ratched, would you come with me, please?
Doctor. The governor would like a word--
How is the patient? Did he pull through?
Y-- yes.
Fantastic. Look, I told the reporters and the photographers to go upstairs.
translation.es: Genial. Les dije a los reporteros y a los fotógrafos que suban.

translation.en: You'll be on one side of the bed, I'll be on the other, handing you the check for $75,000.
translation.es: Estará de un lado de la cama y yo al otro, dándole el cheque por 75 000 dólares.

translation.en: - The patient will be in the middle. - Wha--
translation.es: El paciente estará en el medio.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Doctor, a dozen reporters just saw a member of your staff save a man's life.
translation.es: Los reporteros vieron cómo su empleada le salvó la vida a un hombre.

translation.en: Let's not discourage them from putting that in the story,
translation.es: No impidamos que lo incluyan en la historia

translation.en: and let's make sure they have a photo to go with that story.
translation.es: y asegurémonos de que obtengan una foto adecuada.

translation.en: I told you, I don't do photographs.
translation.es: Dije que no quería fotografías mías.

translation.en: - We have-- - You're fine.
She's the one that saved his life. I choose her.
translation.es: Ella le salvó la vida. La elijo.

translation.en: All right, gentlemen, one more shot and we're done.
translation.es: Caballeros, una foto más y terminamos.

translation.en: Great. Let's get one with the two of us. Huh?
Please don't put your hand on me like that.
translation.es: Por favor, no me toque así.

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, I guess she works here now.
Hello, Mr. Salvatore.
I'm sorry about your brother.
I know how you feel right now,
not being able to be with him.
translation.es: al no poder estar con él.

translation.en: Told that you're mad…
translation.es: Que le digan que está loco...

translation.en: when that's what's driving you mad.
translation.es: cuando eso es lo que lo enloquece.

translation.en: Isn't it?
I know how that feels.
I had a brother.
He was the only family I ever had.
Well, the only family I ever knew, anyway.
translation.es: Bueno, la única familia que conocí.

translation.en: I remember my mother and father, but I can't picture them.
translation.es: Recuerdo a mis padres, pero no cuál era su aspecto.

translation.en: All I remember is a…
a feeling.
You see, I was taken away from them when I was very young…
translation.es: Me alejaron de ellos cuando era muy pequeña.

translation.en: and told that someday I would see them again.
translation.es: Me dijeron que algún día volvería a verlos.

translation.en: That they would come for me.
But that was a lie.
They never did.
And so all I had was my brother.
translation.es: Así que solo tenía a mi hermano.

translation.en: And then he was taken away from me too.
translation.es: Y luego me lo quitaron también.

translation.en: And he needed me.
He really needed me…
and I was helpless.
There was nothing I could do to protect him anymore.
translation.es: Ya no podía hacer nada para protegerlo.

translation.en: Right now, there's something difficult I have to tell you.
The doctors and nurses here,
they want to give you hope…
that one day you can leave here and see your family again.
translation.es: de que saldrá de aquí algún día y volverá a ver a su familia.

translation.en: But you deserve someone to show you mercy, Mr. Salvatore,
translation.es: Pero merece que alguien le muestre misericordia, Sr. Salvatore,

translation.en: and so I have to tell you
that I know for a fact that they are never going to let that happen.
translation.es: que sé con certeza que no permitirán que eso suceda.

translation.en: You are going to spend the rest of your life in here…
translation.es: Pasará el resto de su vida aquí...

translation.en: because your family doesn't ever want to see you again.
translation.es: porque su familia no quiere volver a verlo.

translation.en: It's something I wish someone had told me when I was young…
translation.es: Ojalá me hubieran dicho eso cuando era pequeña...

translation.en: so I could stop believing otherwise.
translation.es: para dejar de creer lo contrario.

translation.en: How different I would be if someone had.
But I have to tell you,
you have been subjected to enough pain.
translation.es: que ya le han causado demasiado dolor.

translation.en: You deserve to be free from it.
translation.es: Merece que lo liberen del dolor.

translation.en: I am only gonna tell you this once…
translation.es: Solo le diré esto una vez.

translation.en: but there is a letter opener on Dr. Hanover's desk.
translation.es: Hay un abrecartas en el escritorio del Dr. Hanover.

translation.en: I can take you there right now.
Would you like that?
Fellow Californians.
Hello, Jerry.
Glad you could make it.
Miss Ratched.
Do you take me for an idiot?
Nurse Bucket informed me
that Father Murphy suffered cardiogenic shock.
translation.es: me dijo que el padre Murphy sufrió un choque cardiogénico.

translation.en: That's right.
Strange that the seal is freshly broken,
translation.es: Es extraño que el sello esté recién roto.

translation.en: considering none of our patients are on this medication.
translation.es: Ninguno de nuestros pacientes toma este medicamento.

translation.en: Of course it would be dangerous for somebody with Father Murphy's condition to take these.
translation.es: Sería peligroso que alguien en el estado del padre Murphy tomara esto.

translation.en: Wouldn't you say?
Yes.
I honestly don't know what you're asking me, Doctor.
translation.es: No sé de qué me habla, doctor.

translation.en: Is there somebody in my office?
Dr. Hanover, are you feeling all right?
Oh, God.
I don't…
How'd he get in here?
Clearly, he wasn't being supervised closely enough.
translation.es: Claramente, no lo supervisaban de cerca.

translation.en: God damn that Bucket!
- Dr. Hanover. - What am I going to do? The press is here.
translation.es: - Dr. Hanover. - ¿Qué hago? La prensa está aquí.

translation.en: You are in a state of shock right now.
What has happened here is a tragedy, yes.
translation.es: Lo que pasó es una tragedia.

translation.en: All my work. Everything, everything I'm fighting for…
translation.es: Cielos. Todo aquello por lo que he trabajado...

translation.en: I'll be exposed.
- This-- this negligence will ruin me! - Dr. Hanover.
translation.es: Todo saldrá a la luz. - ¡Esto me arruinará! - Dr. Hanover.

translation.en: - Will ruin me! - Dr. Hanover, you must stop!
I will take care of this.
You stand up tall and proud, you walk out of this room,
translation.es: Levantará la cabeza, saldrá de aquí

translation.en: face the governor, and you be quick about it. He's waiting.
translation.es: y se enfrentará al gobernador. Él lo espera.

translation.en: Yes.
Thank you. Thank you.
And Dr. Hanover.
When you have a moment with the governor after his speech,
translation.es: Cuando hable con el gobernador tras su discurso,

translation.en: you tell him you've offered me a position here.
translation.es: dígale que me ofreció un puesto aquí.

translation.en: He will be pleased.
Yes. Yes, of course.
He'll be pleased.
I am a child of California.
translation.es: Soy hijo de California. Me enorgullece considerarme uno de sus hijos nativos.

translation.en: I'm proud to count myself amongst her native sons.
translation.es: Me enorgullece considerarme uno de sus hijos nativos.

translation.en: I was raised on the promise of this great state.
translation.es: Me criaron con las promesas de este gran estado.

translation.en: What exactly are you doing in there?
Hello, Nurse Bucket.
Dr. Hanover asked me to wash the towels in his private bathroom.
translation.es: El Dr. Hanover me pidió que lave las toallas de su baño privado.

translation.en: He asked you to wash his towels together with the linen from the patients' rooms?
translation.es: ¿Le pidió que las lavara con las sábanas de los pacientes?

translation.en: Maybe you haven't been listening to his lectures,
but Dr. Hanover believes all human beings are equal.
translation.es: El doctor cree que todos los humanos somos iguales.

translation.en: I believe in the dreams of California,
translation.es: Creo en los sueños de California.

translation.en: dreams shared by every restless soul
translation.es: Sueños compartidos por todas las almas inquietas

translation.en: who pulled up stakes and journeyed west to discover this land.
translation.es: que dejaron sus hogares y viajaron al oeste para descubrir esta tierra.

translation.en: A place where our tomorrows are better than our yesterdays,
translation.es: Un lugar donde nuestro mañana es mejor que nuestro ayer

translation.en: and where we do not shrink from the responsibility that is our fellow man!
translation.es: y donde no ignoraremos la responsabilidad de cuidar a nuestro prójimo.

translation.en: I promise you…
that we shall win together!
Hanover, it's been a pleasure. Exceeded expectations.
translation.es: Hanover, fue un placer. Superó las expectativas.

translation.en: Thank you, sir. We'll be in touch.
Yes.
And that nurse…
Tell her I said goodbye.
There's not a lot of meat on her bones, but what's there is choice.
translation.es: No tiene mucha carne en los huesos, pero la que tiene es de primera.

translation.en: Let's go!
Edmund Tolleson, you're to be held at Lucia State Mental Hospital
translation.es: Edmund Tolleson, estará en el Hospital Estatal de Lucía

translation.en: for a period of 120 days,
or until Dr. Richard Hanover can make the accurate recommendation
translation.es: o hasta que el Dr. Hanover haga una recomendación

translation.en: regarding your fitness to stand trial.
translation.es: sobre su aptitud para ser juzgado.

translation.en: During this time, you are still a prisoner of the state of California,
translation.es: Sigue siendo prisionero del estado de California

translation.en: and will be treated as such.
Edmund Tolleson?
Is that you?
It's me.
I found you.
I finally found you.
I don't wanna die.
You're not going to die, Edmund.
I promise.
